archimate:Requirement.name: NC.1.5.10e: e) preventing information about them (e.g. the manufacturer and model of the firewall, and the version numbers of the operating system and security software) from being disclosed on the network.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
